title: The Polish National Radio Orchestra. No. 2
brief_description: The Polish national Radio Orchestra conducted by Jerzy Katlewicz plays the Symphony No. 4 in B flat major, Opus 60 by Beethoven and the Symphonic Poem “Les Preludes” by Liszt, as originally presented at the Capitol Theatre, Perth during their tour of Australia.
